headline: Palantir (PLTR) Is Called Too Expensive by Schwab Guests
summary: Doug Clinton, the CEO of investment advisory firm Intelligent Alpha, and Tom Essaye, a veteran professional trader, agreed that Palantir (PLTR) is too expensive to buy at this point. Clinton and Essaye were both guests on Schwab Network recently. Palantir’s Valuation Is Problematic, Clinton and Essaye Said “Our AI models don’t like Palantir enough for […]
